post.body: happens...LOL
never used to clean mine either until it got bad. Learned the hard way. parents are ok now.warm & in own house w/heat
do a total clean once a week. It doesn't take as long if you do it often. *wink*
your xmas card today. The boys are so big now! Such cuties. Thank you!
in FLA, parents live in Maine. Nothing I can do from here where the sun is out.
The shelters are full up. No power since 3am. Literally sitting there layered in clothes and blankets, havent eaten.
storm in Maine, 1/2 state w/out power. Bad situation. Can you check the news? Momdad freezing to death in house.
no. But my blog has been my bf for a few years now too. It's unconditional love...LOL
test is positive. If she's smart, she'll stop at just one. hahaha
problem, didn't know it was sensitive content. :)
should use http://tinypic.com/ & then post the link to the jpeg. Get more help that way maybe.

good but can someone else cook it? I is way too tired to cook all that. It feels like sandwich night. again. haha

is just so so so wrong. LOL
Twitter Jewelry contest. Today's prize is a ruby heart pendant w/ruby stud earrings! Lucky RT wins. http://www.gemaffair.com
man, I freaking love nonpareils too. I doubt I could pass them up either...LOL
new Fringe till January 20th. I'm hooked on the show. Reminds me of X-files.
did not link to me in that post, my link is in the sidebar. This only started happening after the newest WP upgrade.
didn't do it before, ppl upgraded to the new WP, and Bam! Tons of new links but they are not new links.
links to my blogs are in sidebars, but it says new. I get about 100 notices a day now saying a blog has linked to me.
have Google feed reader set up to find all new links to my blogs, & the new WP says every new post is a link, but it's not.
http://twitpic.com/xpci - Oh those are super cute! I LOVE them!
poor thing! Going to sleep now won't help, maybe try getting an hour if you can. Can't sleep, pound the coffee now!
HATE having to call Verizon about anything at all, I hope you can get it working again w/out having to call them.
has the new Banjo-Kazooie game, he likes it a wicked lot, age 15.
will do a search for reviews.
I owe them big time!: I owe my friend Shell and her husband big time, for helping my parents out last night. Mos.. http://tinyurl.com/5hxhzm
Friend Shell & her hubby going down w/battery powered heater & coffee & warm food for my parents.
Maine news says power maybe restored by next week.http://www.wmtw.com/news/18251991/detail.html
Maine state is now w.out power from north to south, only few areas have power & heat. Power trucks from other states are headed to try& help
Dreary winter day sucking much ass.
